title: Trump's Fear-Mongering Oval Office Address & Schumer and Pelosi's Awkward Rebuttal | Barry Jenkins
itunes:title: Trump's Fear-Mongering Oval Office Address & Schumer and Pelosi's Awkward Rebuttal | Barry Jenkins
description:
President Trump demonizes migrants in an Oval Office speech, Desi Lydic reacts to Jeff Bezos's divorce announcement, and Barry Jenkins discusses "If Beale Street Could Talk."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
